name: REBOL Script File
summary: Learn about .REB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The default extension for REBOL scripts is .R. The ".reb" extension may be used if the ".r" extension is already used by another application.

description: Script that contains code written in the REBOL (Relative Expression Based Object Language) programming language; can be compiled into an executable program using a REBOL compiler.
